title: Short-Intensive Hybrid Agile-Based Information Systems Development Project Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Small-group project-based learning environment using real-time online collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can prototype an information system reflecting actual business requirements within 3 days by applying hybrid Agile methodologies
Learners can establish response strategies and modify systems within 24 hours in response to sudden requirement changes (requirement shocks)
Learners can design project management processes by combining core techniques from Scrum, Kanban, and XP methodologies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
